name: Mike Tyson
review: These flossers cured my lisp!

name: Taylor Swift
review: Does this make up for all those jet flights?

name: John Travolta
review: First I gotta pay 5 dollas for a milkshake, and now they're chargin' me 10 for some floss?

name: Logan Paul
review: It filters Prime too!

name: Gordon Ramsey
review: Makes it taste like a donkey's bathwater. Next!

name: Pedro Pascal
review: I am your water daddy now.

name: Ricky Gervais
review: The only time I'll ever use a filter.

name: Theo Von
review: Man we had this one dude who would drink straight from the Mississipi man. I mean, we would just look over, and there he was, busting straight into the Bayou, man. So anyways... I'm thankful for this thang.

name: Roy Scheider
review: We're gonna need a bigger bottle.

name: Timothee Chalamet
review: If it can survive the dune, it can survive anywhere.

name: George Washington
review: I crossed the Delaware with this thing. It's legit.

name: Anakin Skywalker
review: These shorts covered my missing leg, but I think I'm looking for something a bit more... dark.

name: The Incredible Hulk
review: Warning: not for every skin tone!

name: Lego Man
review: Due to unforeseen circumstances, I had to purchase these out of necessity.

name: Charlie XCX
review: Not exactly what I had in mind when I said 'Brat Summer,' but we can make it work.

name: Jeff Bezos
review: Good to know at least one thing in my family isn't full of plastic.

name: Eiffel 65
review: Make a blue one!

name: John Cena
review: Never seen but always delivers. Just like me!

name: Arnold Schwarzanegger
review: Nice and snug, like my grip.

name: Harry Potter
review: It feels good to know I'm protected in case Malfoy has any tricks up his sleeve.

name: Rocky Balboa
review: Yo Adrian, why do they call 'em boxers if they ain't got nothin' to do with boxin?

name: Mark Zuckerberg
review: Ordering 4 units of 100% human clothing. Type: unknown; style: trousers (match confidence: 84%).

name: Dwayne Johnson
review: Hey Kevin I think I found some socks for you. They come in youth XS!

name: Joe Rogan
review: Man, those socks are super black--Jamie pull up the video of those black bears fighting.

name: Harry Kane
review: Speech recognition could not detect any speech. Please try again.

name: Inigo Montoya
review: Hello, my name is Inigo Montoya. My old socks got holes in them. Prepare to be bought.

name: Shrek
review: Don't buy. Left my teeth too white.

name: Keanu Reeves
review: It’s simple. It’s clean. It’s kind. Brushing with bamboo is... breathtaking.

name: Kung Fu Panda
review: Do you really have to ask?

name: Spongebob SquarePants
review: Finally!

name: Yoda
review: Scrub wisely, you must.

name: Thanos
review: A small price to pay for scentation.

name: Peter Griffin
review: Hey Lois, look at this Push Pop. Looks like its grape flavored.

name: The Incredible Hulk
review: Finally, one that keeps my face the right color!

name: Danny DeVito
review: I don’t usually wash my face with anything I can’t eat, but this thing? It’s a little soap brick of joy. No plastic, no nonsense. Smells like Mother Nature punched me in the pores.

name: Marie Kondo
review: It sparked joy, and also removed three years of emotional clutter from my T-zone. Lost a star because the bar slipped into the drain once and I mourned it like a pet.

name: Batman
review: Too bright. Too clean. Justice is supposed to be gritty. But Alfred likes it, so I keep it in the Batcave guest bathroom.

name: Aquaman
review: Finally, a shampoo that doesn’t dissolve in saltwater. Hair’s flowin’, scalp’s chillin’, dolphins approved. Zero plastic, all power.

name: Wednesday Addams
review: Hydrating. Disappointingly cheerful scent. I prefer the scent of despair, but it does leave my hair disturbingly soft.
